r3135 | ritzmann | 2016-01-28 16:58:08 +0100 (Do, 28. Jan 2016) | 7 Zeilen
Ge„nderte Pfade:
   M /trunk/Src/Control/LocalDatabase/cLocalContext.cpp
   M /trunk/Src/Control/LocalDatabase/cLocalContext.h
   M /trunk/Src/Control/LocalDatabase/cSubFile.cpp
   M /trunk/Src/Control/LocalDatabase/cSubFile.h
   M /trunk/Src/System/Database/cContext.cpp
   M /trunk/Src/System/Database/cContext.h
   M /trunk/Src/System/Database/cVarDef.cpp
   M /trunk/Src/System/Database/cVarDef.h
   M /trunk/Src/System/Sys/cConvUtils.cpp
   M /trunk/Src/System/Sys/cConvUtils.h
   A /trunk/Src/System/Sys/cStringBuffer.cpp
   A /trunk/Src/System/Sys/cStringBuffer.h

added the class cStringBuffer and added methods that use cStringBuffer objects instead of
std string objects to generate datasets. A cStringBuffer object has an interface similar
to std::string and is associated with a file.
=(const char *), +=(const char *) directly write to the file instead of using std::strings to
hold the data. These methods do not consume large memory amounts even if the resulting dataset
is very large (200 Megabyte for example)

Added a static cMemoryPtr object with resize capabilities when used buffer size increases current buffer size.
